title: *UNLOCKED* Patreon Ep #1: State...Yo Business!
itunes:title: *UNLOCKED* Patreon Ep #1: State...Yo Business!
description:
As a special treat we're dropping our first Patreon episode in the regular feed for folks to check out and hear what they're missing! In this one Adal tests Erin & JPC on their state knowledge, specifically for Indiana and Mass.! I'm sure we offend the residents but it's too late! It's already recorded! If you enjoy this episode please consider subscribing to the Patreon to receive bonus episodes every single Friday for only $5 a month! You can join at our Patreon

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
